verbs.description: caramelize (third-person singular simple present caramelizes, present participle caramelizing, simple past and past participle caramelized)

entries.meaning: (cooking, transitive) To brown (sugar, or a foodstuff containing sugar) by means of heat.
examples: Slowly cooking the onions will caramelize them, which brings out the sweetness and gives them a brown color.

entries.meaning: (cooking, intransitive) To undergo this kind of conversion or browning.
